README: This JSON document represents the database connection configuration options.
Please, be mindful, read each option's description before setting its value.
connection_description: Please ensure, that you have defined all parameters properly.
Ensure, that details like 'charset' are included (if necessary).
synthetic_data_files_path_description: Directory, from which you can import data files into your database.
connection_pool_size_description: Maximal amount of simultaneous connections to your database server.
encoding_description: If not supplied, then utf-8 will be used as a default.
schema_description: !!!Note, schema parameter is relevant only for database servers that use schemas, for example: PostgreSQL.
Hence, if you are using MySQL, then this parameter is irrelevant for you.
A name of the schema, that will contain all migrated tables.
If not supplied, then a new schema will be created automatically.
